titles.title: Ease Our Soldiers' Minds Act

To amend the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act to require that the Department of Defense notify the creditors of persons in military service and persons entering military service, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Opportunity.

bill.summary: 9/8/2005--Introduced. Ease Our Soldiers' Minds Act - Amends the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act to direct the Secretary of the military department concerned to notify creditors of individuals entering into or serving in military service of the rights and benefits afforded to such individuals by such Act. Requires the same notification to consumer reporting agencies.
